title: Emails already linked to accounts
body: I have decided to make an account for my little brother with one of my secondary email accounts. However when I go to make an account it says the email is already in use. I then try a summoner name recovery email to be sent to that email however it never arrives. What is happening

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you checked the email account's spam folder? It's possible the email is being filtered. If not then you'll probably need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as they're the only ones who can help with account related issues.
